Class AeMessageContextTypeMapper

All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeTypeMapper
public class AeMessageContextTypeMapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeTypeMapper

Implements the type mapper interface for an Axis MessageContext.

getTypeMapping

protected javax.xml.rpc.encoding.TypeMapping getTypeMapping()
Getter for the type mapping object. Installs a type mapping reigstry on the context. This registry will house our mappings and delegate all other requests to the default registry in the context.

getMessageContext

protected org.apache.axis.MessageContext getMessageContext()
Getter for the message context
